member.name: IP_ADAPTER_DNS_SUFFIX
member.summary: TheIP_ADAPTER_DNS_SUFFIX structure stores a DNS suffix in a linked list of DNS suffixes for a particular adapter.

member.name: IP_ADAPTER_DNS_SUFFIX.Next
member.summary: A pointer to the next DNS suffix in the linked list.

member.name: IP_ADAPTER_DNS_SUFFIX.String
member.summary: The DNS suffix for this DNS suffix entry.
